addr: Shoreditch. 17 Blossom Street . London E1 6PL GB
title: CMU Insights: How The Music Business Works - A Seminar Programme
desc: This eight part evening course provides a complete overview of the music industry in 2016, offering music business professionals the chance to get a full understanding of their sector, with a focus on revenue streams and music rights; how artists can build, analyse and monetise a fanbase; and the deals they need to do to capitalise on all the opportunities. The sessions run from 6.30pm to 8.30pm on 18, 25 Jan; 1, 8, 15, 22, 29 Feb; and 7 Mar.? .
